title: IS_VEHICLE_DOOR_FULLY_OPEN
content:
0x3E933CFF7B111C220xC2385B6F// IsVehicleDoorFullyOpen
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_DOOR_FULLY_OPEN(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.doorIndex: The index of the door to check.Returns: A bool indiciating if the specified door is fully open on the specified vehicle.See eDoorId declared in SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT
codeBlocks:
// IsVehicleDoorFullyOpen
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_DOOR_FULLY_OPEN(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for IS_VEHICLE_DOOR_FULLY_OPEN
IsVehicleDoorFullyOpen(vehicle, 0)
